org.jboss.seam.ui.util.cdk
Class RendererBase

java.lang.Object
  javax.faces.render.Renderer
      org.jboss.seam.ui.util.cdk.RendererBase
Direct Known Subclasses:
ButtonRendererBase, CacheRendererBase, CommandButtonParameterRendererBase, DecorateRendererBase, DefaultActionRendererBase, DownloadRendererBase, EqualityValidatorRendererBase, FileUploadRendererBase, FormattedTextRendererBase, FragmentRendererBase, GraphicImageRendererBase, LinkRendererBase, RemoteRendererBase, ResourceRendererBase, StyleRendererBase, TokenRendererBase, ValidateAllRendererBase
public abstract class RendererBase
extends javax.faces.render.Renderer

Mangled version of Ajax4Jsf's RendererBase without supporting classes Base Renderer for all chameleon Skin's and components. At most, make all common procedures and realise concrete work in "template" methods.

Version:
$Revision: 5308 $ $Date: 2007-06-20 04:46:17 +0200 (St, 20 VI 2007) $
Author:
asmirnov@exadel.com (latest modification by $Author: gavin $)

getComponentClass
